title: Oldsmobile Font from 1970 - Suggestions?
content:
Clarendon Bold is close - anyone else have an idea? Thanks - great place here!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Allen\_D&L\_70Rallye350.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100115115604/http:/typophile.com/files/Allen_D&L_70Rallye350.jpg) | 158.63 KB |
author: Mac_Ink

comments.content: I think it's a Clarendon (expanded) -- you could try a "Wood Type" font as well (based on similar letterforms)
